Package io.servicetalk.transport.api

Interface RetryableException

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConnectionLimitReachedException, ConnectionRejectedException, ConnectTimeoutException, NoAvailableHostException, ProxyResponseException, RequestRejectedException, RetryableConnectException
public interface RetryableException
A marker-interface for exceptions which are safely retryable and occur only before ServiceTalk starts writing a request to the network.
